title: Heimer 2 Billion Second cooldown on Q
body:
http://vvcap.net/db/sKyH8vlinkci6QJoME3J.htp

I dont know what else to say the picture in the link provided explains it all

replies.body: This is a known issue, but QA has been unable to reproduce this in testing.  Any info you can provide on how you got this to happen would be helpful.

Aregionius is completely correct!  We do know about this issue, and our QA teams are currently investigating.  Given that we do not have a 100% reproduction rate, if you can reproduce this issue 100% of the time, please do not hesitate to let us know and provide these steps so we can get this fixed asap!
I have heard potions being linked to bugs on heimer, and also have heard a fix for this is adjusting your CDR buy selling/buying a CDR item. I will test both of these out.
